description: T2 - Ash x2 On Broom Road frontage	Prune back from road by 2m and selectively reduce by up to 1m to rebalance T4 - Calocedrus - Broom water west frontage	Crown Lift to provide 4m clearance from ground level. T6 - Monterrey Cypress By rear entrance	Crown Lift to provide 5m clearance from ground level. Final height 12mm and spread 12m and remove major deadwood T17 - Cedar (Cedrus spp) - In Playground	Refuce overlong laterals to main crown line as preemptiveto further branch failure maintaining natural appearance T20 - Yew x 3 - By Garden room	Crown Lift to provide 4m clearance from ground level. Final height 8m and spread 7mT21 - Poplar (Populus spp)row of 16 - Adjacent to Broom Road	Fell 2 nearly dead specimens and remove major deadwood from remainder T24 - Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) On car park side of Broom Road	Crown Lift to provide 4m clearance from ground level. Final height 9m and spread 6m
